decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s): Site Location Plan P_L_600, Existing Site Plan E_S_400, Proposed Site Plan P_S_400, Existing Front Garden Plan E_P_301, Existing Plan (Tree Survey) CD-22-058-01, Existing and Proposed Rear Elevation 0048-1352-P1, Proposed Planting Plan CD-22-036-01 rev E, Proposed Plan CD-22-036-01 rev I received on 11 June 2024, Proposed/Existing Elevation Gate P_E_201, Existing Front Elevation E_E_200, Proposed Front Elevation P_E_200, Heritage Statement, Design and Access Statement dated 26.04.2024, Arboricultural Report and Impact Assessment dated 13 May 2024, Tree Data Spreadsheet, Tree Constrains Plan, Impact Assessment Plan, Tree Protection Plan.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, in the interest of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be in accordance with the plans and documents approved in condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Alterations to front elevation involving replacement of front fence; enlargement of front gate; alterations to the rear garden
